$TSLA $AAPL $MSFT $COST A stock market crash seems to be brewing, so I sold all my stocks. As you can see in both my portfolios, I try my best to protect my investments as soon as I notice a downtrend or slow bleed. Once I see a great bargain, then I come back in.
